lines: Kungaba sekuseni ku phum’ ilanga Nxa ukukhanya ku dabul’ ubumnyama
Laph’ uJesu efika nob’khosi bAkhe: Ukwamukel’ abAkhe
O, Nkosi koba nini na? Si sho ngenjabulo.
U sefikile uKrestu, Aleluya! Amen! Aleluya! Amen!
Kungaba semini, kumbe kuhwalala; Kungaba mhlaumbe phakathi komnyama.
Ku vel’ ukukhanya kwenkazimbo yAkhe: uJes’ ethath’ abAkhe.
Laph’ amabandl’ ehlayo ethi: "Hosana!" Nabangcwele nezingelosi zi khona.
Yena, umkhumbi wesisa u mzungeze: uJes’ ethath’ abAkhe.
Yek’ injabulo s’enyuka si ngafanga! Akukho, sililo, kudana nakufa.
Emafwini obukhosi si hlwithelwe: uJes’ ethath’ abAkhe.
